name: FetchUserInfo
description: Retrieves the consented UserInfo and other claims about the logged-in subject (end-user).

$ul: **first_name**: The first name of the end-user.
**friendly_name**: The friendly name of the end-user.
**last_name**: The last name of the end-user.
**user_sid**: The URL of the party that will create the token and sign it with its private key.
